channel.title: I can't get my compiler to work. Somthing to do with the classpaths?
channel.description: I can't get my compiler to work. It says "'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command." I recently read a thread that said the classpaths need to be set.But exactly how do I do that? :confused: I really need help on it, so i can put more npc's on my server, and also add health to the npcs.

item.title: I can't get my compiler to work. Somthing to do with the classpaths?
item.dc:creator: @aznowner aznowner
item.description:
@aznowner wrote:

ok my compiler says

Note:stream.java uses or overides a deprecates API.
Note:Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Starting cheezscape server on 0.0.0.0:43594
config\objects.cfg: file not found.

ok i know it suppose to say the top 3 lines but is it suppose to say
config\objects.cfg: file not found? is mine messed up? it also says that when i runserver.

does yours say that? if it doesnt how to get them? thnx

Read full topic
